item.title: Exclusive: Growing tech firm Anthropic expands S.F. presence with large office lease in SoMa
item.author: San Francisco Chronicle
item.description: "After raising a staggering $13 billion this month, Anthropic appears to be spending a portion of its unfathomable funding on growing its downtown San Francisco headquarters. Last week the company signed a major lease to expand its footprint in the city. The move comes after Anthropic , a front-runn...
